#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t,i,j;
    cin>>t;
    getchar();
    while(t--)
    {
        int cnt[27],sum=0;
        memset(cnt,0,sizeof(cnt));
        char ch='a';
        while(ch!='\n')
        {
            ch=getchar();
            if(cnt[ch-'a']==0 && ch!='\n')
            {
                sum++;
                cnt[ch-'a']++;
            }
        }

        if(sum&1)
           cout<<"Counter Terrorist"<<"\n";
        else
            cout<<"Terrorist\n";

    }
    return 0;
}
